page.title: 10PEOPLE CRESSBROOK WARDLOW
page.content: {Cressbrook}has 106 males and 109 females.{Wardlow}has 49 males and 46 females.All ages are fairly equally represented.Most people in these communities live to old age. Inhabitants of the area are mainly working class. As many of the old mill cottages , especially the Ravensdale Cottages,are now privately owned; by families who live outside the area,and use them for second homes;the population is periodically increased at week-ends and holidays. These communities are very closely knit. Most young people do not move away from home to work, but find work locally. The Tideswell doctor holds a surgery once a week in a private house in the village.
